long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nobody enjoys dealing with intrusive ads while browsing, especially when you must wait to skip them. With the ADs Shade browser extension, you can block these distractions and browse seamlessly.

How Does It Work?
Installing the ad blocker is quick and requires no registration or payment.
As a browser extension, it automatically blocks:
- Banners and pop-ups
- Redirects and trackers
- Video ADs

The lightweight design ensures it doesnâ€™t take up much space, while advanced technology (manifest version 3) removes ads without disrupting essential content.

Privacy Protection
ADs Shade does not conduct surveillance or other scams.  No personal information is stored on our servers and all interactions are encrypted. We only collect basic usage statistics for analytics.

For more information, please review our Privacy Policy or EULA on our website.
